title: DebatePosition
description: Schema for agent debate pattern output. Defines a structured position in a multi-agent debate including arguments, counterarguments, and a recommendation.

position.description: The agent's stance on the debate topic

confidence.description: Confidence in the stated position (0.0 to 1.0)

arguments.description: Key arguments supporting the agent's position

counterarguments.description: Responses to arguments from other agents' positions

recommendation.description: Specific actionable recommendation based on the position

classification.description: Classification marking for this debate position
